availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Tudor (Maysville, Kentucky, tinner and farmer)

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, tinner and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Harriet M. Hickman Tudor in Mason County on February 28, 1860. Father of Thomas Tudor. Tinner in Maysville in 1850. Tinner in Maysville in 1860. Farmer in Mason County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 105A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 19.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 4, p. 441A.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 000281844, p. 155.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 9th Congressional District, Vol. 2, September 1863, p. 164 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on May 22, 2020).
Find A Grave, "George W. Tudor (1830-1910)," Memorial 128646134, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/128646134/george-w_-tudor (accessed May 22, 2020).
